```{r, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
```

When the competition starts, the reference data used for scoring and reporting
will be presented here.

```{r echo=FALSE}
library('magrittr')
ref_data <- Sys.getenv("APP_BASE_PATH") %>%
  file.path(
    ., paste0("duke_fintech_trading_competition_", "2022"), "usdt_3mo_cmt.csv" 
  ) %>%
  readr::read_csv()

DT::datatable(
  ref_data,
  class = "cell-border stripe"
)
```
